column_description: the id number identifying the loan data
llm_column_description: The unique identifier for each loan entry.

column_description: the id number identifying the account
llm_column_description: The account_id column uniquely identifies each loan account.

column_description: the date when the loan is approved
llm_column_description: The date column represents the date when the loan was initiated.
The amount column represents the total sum of money associated with a loan transaction.
The duration column represents the length of time in months for the loan.
The payments column represents the amount of money paid regularly for the loan.
The status column indicates the current status of the loan.
